sa: Sally Morgan, Baroness Morgan of Huyton
q: names new chair Education Secretary Michael Gove has appointed Sally Morgan, Baroness Morgan of Huyton as the new chair of Ofsted. The new chair will focus on pupil attainment, teaching and learning, leadership, behaviour and safety. I am delighted to be taking up this post. Ofsted has a crucial role to play in the drive to raise standards, especially for the disadvantaged students said Sally Morgan, Baroness Morgan of Huyton in her appointment. will assume the position of executive chief. On the official Google blog Eric Schmidt wrote that he, Larry Page and co-founder Sergey Brin had decided it was time to make some structural changes to the company. This triumvirate approach has real benefits in terms of shared wisdom, and we will continue to discuss the big decisions among the three of us. But we have also agreed to clarify our individual roles so there's clear responsibility and accountability at the top of the company, wrote Eric Schmidt . He further discussed their roles, saying that Larry Page would lead product development and technology strategy along with becoming the company's CEO.
